statements: UPDATE EarningsReports SET company_name='ABC Corp', sentiment_score=0.8, stock_movement='UP' WHERE report_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE earnings_reports SET company_name = 'XYZ Corp' WHERE report_id = 100;
UPDATE stock_predictions SET prediction_result = 'Successful' WHERE report_id = (SELECT report_id FROM earnings_reports WHERE date = '2022-01-01');
UPDATE earnings_report SET sentiment_score = 8.5, company_name = 'Example Company' WHERE report_id = 100
